page.title: 08Alton Saturday (1)
page.content: On a typical Saturday I would get up at about 10:00 a.m. I would go downstairs and have breakfast of a cereal which could be either Weetabix, Cornflakes,Rice Krispies or Bran Flakes and some toast which is cooked bread. After that I would go back upstairs and get dressed.The sort of clothes I wear are sports clothes because "breakers" wear them."Breakers" are people who do breakdancing,which is a kind of gymnastic dance.There are various moves some of which are the windmill,1990, footwork. After that I would go into town, normally I would walk but for some reason e.g. bad weather i.e. hail, rain or snow, I would go in the car.
